column4: XChat is the best client so far...xchat gnome is xchat with no options

like...any options beyond the most simple
for example now i see the typings but when u msg me all the rest will fade and urz will be highlighted and so i feel only 2 people is in chat

theyr is a user list its just you didnt know how to use it
i guess, i just prefer regular xchat without any of the config stripped out
